pros: Excellent stability shoe; Good lacing; Looks the part; Comfortable; Consistent ride in any condition; Good grip; Perfect daily runner
cons: Runs half a size small; Heel counter not for everyone; Quite heavy
RR_verdict: New Balance’s stability running shoe, Fresh Foam 860 v11, provides amazing support, which I believe is superb for overpronators. I realized that although this shoe has some catches, it’s the perfect choice to help me sustain running longer miles.
awards: Top 12% in road running shoes, Top 3% in New Balance running shoes, Top 8% most popular running shoes
use: Jogging |, Walking |, All-day wear |, For beginners
